tool.name: study_factor_values
tool.description: Get list of factor values for given factor used in a MetaboLights study

param.name: mtbls_id
param.label: MetaboLights Study Identifier.
param.help: MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.

data.name: output
data.label: List of factor values as JSON.

tool.help:
================================================== Get list of study factors for a MetaboLights study ==================================================
This tool gets the list of factor values from a MetaboLights study for a given study factor name. It extracts the factor values from the ISA-Tab study and assay tables.
----- Input -----
MetaboLights Study Identifier ============================= MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.
Factor name =========== A factor name from the list of factors in the study metadata.
------ Output ------
List of factor values as JSON =============================
A list of factor values for the specified factor name as a JSON list. e.g.
::
[ "Exp2", "Exp1" ]
